about.description:
AutoGluon automates machine learning tasks enabling you to easily achieve strong
predictive performance in your applications. With just a few lines of code, you
can train and deploy high-accuracy machine learning and deep learning models on
image, text, time series, and tabular data.
about.summary: AutoML for Image, Text, and Tabular Data

commands: python -c "from autogluon.common import __version__ as v; from packaging.version import parse; expected = '1.3.1'; assert parse(v) == parse(expected), f'{v} != {expected}'"

about.description:
AutoGluon automates machine learning tasks enabling you to easily achieve strong
predictive performance in your applications. With just a few lines of code, you
can train and deploy high-accuracy machine learning and deep learning models on
image, text, time series, and tabular data.
about.summary: AutoML for Image, Text, and Tabular Data

commands: python -c "from autogluon.common import __version__ as v; from packaging.version import parse; expected = '1.3.1'; assert parse(v) == parse(expected), f'{v} != {expected}'"

name: autogluon.common
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "autogluon.common" %}
{% set version = "1.3.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/autogluon/autogluon/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz 
  sha256: fd388cb91e5a9467252be061b1bb90c9735d7f543d1d8335ff75f4b362ce4d86

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install ./common -vv
  number: 0
  script_env:
    - RELEASE=1

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
  # see deps in https://github.com/autogluon/autogluon/blob/master/common/setup.py
  # version bounds are defined in https://github.com/autogluon/autogluon/blob/master/core/src/autogluon/core/_setup_utils.py
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }},<3.13
    - numpy <2.3.0,>=1.25.0
    - pandas <2.3.0,>=2.0.0
    - boto3 <2,>=1.10
    - psutil <7.1.0,>=5.7.3
    - tqdm <5,>=4.38
    - setuptools
    - packaging

test:
  imports:
    - autogluon.common
  commands:
    - python -c "from autogluon.common import __version__ as v; from packaging.version import parse; expected = '{{ version }}'; assert parse(v) == parse(expected), f'{v} != {expected}'"
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://pypi.org/project/autogluon.common
  summary: AutoML for Image, Text, and Tabular Data
  description: |
    AutoGluon automates machine learning tasks enabling you to easily achieve strong 
    predictive performance in your applications. With just a few lines of code, you 
    can train and deploy high-accuracy machine learning and deep learning models on 
    image, text, time series, and tabular data.  
  dev_url: https://github.com/autogluon/autogluon/
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - suzhoum
    - tonyhoo
    - Innixma
    - prateekdesai04
